entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0167.10106] In the statement 9952152 - Statement - Unaudited Condensed Consolidated Interim Statements of Profit or Loss the filer has defined multiple roots calculation elements that do not have a valid calculation tree defined. In the statement 9952152 - Statement - Unaudited Condensed Consolidated Interim Statements of Profit or Loss the filer has defined multiple root calculation elements. It is expected that the calculation tree in this disclosure is a single tree and not multiple trees. The existence of multiple tree's indicate that there is a calculation missing. The root element ProfitLoss has sibling root elements of ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax in the filing. The sibling element ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax should appear as a calculation descendant of ProfitLoss. To fix the issue a parent calculation element should be defined for the element(s) ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax to create a single tree. The element ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax is defined as calculation descendant of ProfitLoss in the IFRS taxonomy.
Rule Element Id:10106 Rule version: 26.0.9 -
